thread.title: Apple goes on green drive in China
thread.title_full: Apple goes on green drive in China

title: Apple goes on green drive in China
text:
Apple goes on green drive in China 
Times Of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
WASHINGTON/SAN FRANCISCO: Apple on Wednesday announced it will build 200MW of solar energy projects in China and work with local suppliers to source more renewable energy, its latest moves to green its Chinese supply chain amid criticism that its local partners are heavy polluters. In addition to bringing on an additional 200MW in northern, eastern and southern China, the tech giant said it will launch an initiative to "drive its manufacturing partners to become more energy efficient and to use clean energy for their manufacturing operations." Apple said the 200MW projects will produce the equ...
